mapper.select: SELECT a.type_cd, a.type_nm, b.news_id, b.score, b.reg_id FROM mhnc91001tb a LEFT JOIN ( SELECT news_id, type_cd, SUM(score) AS score, reg_id FROM mhnd01001tb WHERE news_id = #{news_id} GROUP BY type_cd ) AS b ON a.type_cd = b.type_cd
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mhnd01001tb( news_id, author_id, media_id, type_cd, score, REG_ID, REG_DT )VALUES( #{news_id}, #{author_id}, #{media_id}, #{type_cd}, #{score}, 'admin', now() )
